name: The Keep of Moving Forward
description:
Our brave hero finds himself in the throngs of the underground landscape known as Devil's Decent. To his amazement, the strange aura emitted by the cold, stone walls prevents him from turning back. Will he secede, or will he shove on to meet his fate?

Controls:

You have no control over which direction you face. Getting hit by enemies, your arrows, and the wall cause you to change direction.

  • W / Right-click = Walk forward
  • Space / Left-click = Shoot

Made for GMTK 2020: Out of Control.
